channel.title: Code - Karuta Theme Demo
channel.description: Code - A demo site for the Karuta Hugo theme

item.title: Syntax Highlighting Demo
item.description: Syntax Highlighting The Karuta theme includes excellent syntax highlighting support using Hugo’s built-in Chroma highlighter. JavaScript Example function greet(name) { console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`); return `Welcome to Karuta theme, ${name}`; } const message = greet("Hugo"); document.getElementById("output").textContent = message; Python Example def fibonacci(n): """Generate fibonacci sequence up to n terms.""" a, b = 0, 1 for _ in range(n): yield a a, b = b, a + b # Generate first 10 fibonacci numbers fib_sequence = list(fibonacci(10)) print(f"Fibonacci sequence: {fib_sequence}") HTML Example <!
